participant_1.background:
I have a cat.
Starbucks is my favorite hang out spot.
I spend my weekends browsing antique stores.
I collect little figurines.

participant_2.background:
At night , i party hard in the atlanta club scene , and i never miss a music festival.
I have borderline personality disorder.
It is my universe , and everyone else is just a character in it.
I work as a dental assistant in a ritzy part of town.

content.text: Hey! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to party hard in the Atlanta club scene! And I never miss a music festival.
Oh, that's cool! I love going to Starbucks and browsing antique stores. I also collect little figurines.
That's interesting! I never really got into collecting things. I'm more of a spontaneous person. I love to just go with the flow and see where the day takes me.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm more of a planner. I like to know what's going on and what to expect.
I can see how that would be helpful. I sometimes get myself into trouble because I don't plan ahead.
Well, I think it's important to have a balance between planning and spontaneity.
I agree. I'm trying to be more organized and plan ahead more often.
That's great! I'm sure it will be helpful in the long run.
Thanks for the advice! I'll try my best to follow it.
You're welcome!
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a dental assistant in a ritzy part of town.
Oh, that's cool! I've never been to a ritzy dental office.
They're not all that different from regular dental offices. Just a little more expensive.
I guess that makes sense.
Yeah, it's all about the money.
Well, I'm sure you're doing a great job.
Thanks! I try my best.
I'm sure you're doing a great job.
Thanks! I try my best.
So, you said you have borderline personality disorder. What's that like?
It's a lot of ups and downs. I can be very impulsive and emotional, and I have a hard time controlling my anger. But I'm learning to cope with it and live a normal life.
I'm glad to hear that. I know it can't be easy.
It's not, but I'm trying.
I'm sure you're doing a great job.
Thanks. I appreciate it.
